Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: GPU compute pricing calculator

Set up React + Vite project with Tailwind CSS and implemented a GPU compute pricing calculator with support for A100, H100, and RTX 4090 models. Features include real-time cost calculation, clean dark theme UI, and hardcoded hourly rates.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
